categoryDefinition: The risk is conceivable but is only likely to occur in extreme circumstances.
The risk occurs infrequently and is unlikely to occur within the next three years.
There is an above average chance that the risk will occur at least once in the next three years.
The risk could easily occur, and is likely to occur at least once within the next 12 months.
The risk is already occurring, or is likely to occur more than once within the next 12 months.
